## Louisiana Outer Continental Shelf Revenues for Coastal Protection and Restoration Fund Amendment (2024)

“Do you support an amendment to require that federal revenues received by the state generated from Outer Continental Shelf alternative or renewable energy production be deposited into the Coastal Protection and Restoration Fund?[5]”
## Louisiana Property Tax Sales Administration Amendment (December 2024)
